title: lukedca
author: lukedca
content: I'm selling my ColdCard MK1 (Mark 1) still in his original sealed tamper bag.https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171138_195-min0ce7697f709fc959.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171211_945-mind4356ac232e77956.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171239_143-min5d04a4984e57a7fc.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171259_649-min752459b5acd29d02.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171317_681-minfb0041aaf31e957d.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171336_296-min72cde678bde07bba.jpeg Picking up in The Netherlands or shipping around the world. Payment with escrow.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: You might want to move this over to collectibleshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0You’ll probably get a bit more interest there Any idea what price you are looking for ?
